attributes.action: stop sending our troops on wars that are nothing to do with us, and put our troops on our city's streets to protect the people of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of the ministry of defence and the add forces is to protect the people of the United Kingdom .
the police can not do there job and protect us.
the armed forces should be brought back and put on our city's streets , instead of fighting oil wars that are nothing to do with us .
